title: What I've Been Looking For
lyrics: INTRO:  It's hard to believe That I couldn't see You were always there beside me Thought I was alone With no one to hold But you were always right beside me This feelings like no other I want you to know I've never had someone that knows me like you do the way you do I've never had someone as good for me as you no one like you so lonely before i finally found what i've been looking for
